main_definition: Relating to or involving the postal system, mail delivery, or related services.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to the post office and its operations
meanings_and_examples.example: She works at the local postal office.
The postal worker sorted through a pile of unsorted mail.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Associated with postage stamps and their use
meanings_and_examples.example: He collects rare and valuable postage stamps.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Describing something delivered through the postal system, such as mail or packages
meanings_and_examples.example: The package arrived at my doorstep this morning; it was a postal delivery.
